main event: A witness observed a bright red object in the sky from a vacant lot near New Carlisle, Ohio, for approximately 15 minutes.
interesting points: The witness initially described the object as a barn light,The object was seen moving rapidly toward the west after hovering,Several other witnesses reported seeing the same bright light,The object was red in color and had been distinguished from conventional lights,No physical evidence was left at the scene.
sighted object: a large bright red hovering object
witness description: The witness reported being a male, 25 years old, with prior experiences of seeing similar phenomena.
